net.bytebuddy.dynamic.loading

类 ClassLoadingStrategy.ForBootstrapInjection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.dynamic.loading.ClassLoadingStrategy.ForBootstrapInjection
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ClassLoadingStrategy<ClassLoader>
    封闭接口:
    ClassLoadingStrategy<T extends ClassLoader>

    public static class ClassLoadingStrategy.ForBootstrapInjection
extends Object
implements ClassLoadingStrategy<ClassLoader>
    A class loading strategy which allows class injection into the bootstrap class loader if appropriate.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 net.bytebuddy.dynamic.loading.ClassLoadingStrategy

        ClassLoadingStrategy.Configurable<S extends ClassLoader>, ClassLoadingStrategy.Default, ClassLoadingStrategy.ForBootstrapInjection, ClassLoadingStrategy.ForUnsafeInjection, ClassLoadingStrategy.UsingLookup

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 net.bytebuddy.dynamic.loading.ClassLoadingStrategy

        BOOTSTRAP_LOADER, NO_PROTECTION_DOMAIN

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ForBootstrapInjection(Instrumentation instrumentation, File folder)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ForBootstrapInjection

        public ForBootstrapInjection(Instrumentation instrumentation,
                             File folder)
        Creates a new injector which is capable of injecting classes into the bootstrap class loader.
        参数:
        instrumentation - The instrumentation to use.
        folder - The folder to save jar files in.

    • 方法详细资料

      • load

        public Map<TypeDescription,Class<?>> load(ClassLoader classLoader,
                                          Map<TypeDescription,byte[]> types)
        从接口复制的说明: ClassLoadingStrategy
        Loads a given collection of classes given their binary representation.
        指定者:
        load 在接口中 ClassLoadingStrategy<ClassLoader>
        参数:
        classLoader - The class loader to used for loading the classes.
        types - Byte array representations of the types to be loaded mapped by their descriptions, where an iteration order defines an order in which they are supposed to be loaded, if relevant.
        返回:
        A collection of the loaded classes which will be initialized in the iteration order of the returned collection.
